text:
[Verse]
City lights are glowing bright
Steps feel light in the night
Raindrops falling from the sky
Hear the rhythm come alive

[Verse]
Splashing feet on the street
Find the groove feel the beat
Laughing voices all around
Lost and found in this sound

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain so free
Move your body feel the glee
Heartbeats matching every drop
In this moment we won't stop

[Verse]
Clouds above come rolling in
Letting go we're giving in
Wind it whispers through the leaves
In the rain we find reprieve

[Verse]
Just a touch from water’s kiss
In this world of simple bliss
Let the music take control
Rainy night dancing soul

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain so free
Move your body feel the glee
Heartbeats matching every drop
In this moment we won't stop
title: Dancing in the Rain
